name: The Dotabase
tagline: Game Companion and Match Tracking for DotA2 on mobile devices
body:
## Welcome
The Dotabase is a new app for iOS (and soon Android) to help you with the DotA 2 game, released by Valve Software.

### iOS
You can find the iOS version on the app store [here](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-dotabase/id970264887?ls=1&mt=8)

### Android
Coming soon!


#### Support
Please contact dotabase@icloud.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
